newsitem.title: USA: Paging Partners hires Laidlaw & Co.
newsitem.headline: Paging Partners hires Laidlaw & Co.

text.p: Paging Partners Corp said on Wednesday it retained Laidlaw & Co to help the company explore all strategic alternatives for enhancing shareholder value, including the possible sale of the company.

"The wireless marketplace is moving so quickly, and the company has so many options, that we felt it advisable to reach out to a well-established and highly respected advisor to assist us in assessing those options," said Richard Giacchi, the company's president.
Paging Partners said it offers one-way wireless messaging services from southern New Hampshire to northern Virginia.
